analysis: Market analysis indicates positive momentum favoring buyers. RSI at 68.12 remains in neutral territory. Money Flow Index at 48.51 suggests balanced volume distribution. MACD showing trend transition, awaiting confirmation. Price maintaining above Bollinger middle band, uptrend intact. Price structure supports bullish continuation with MA and SAR confirmation. Ichimoku cloud analysis supports bullish bias. Stochastic at 80.47 warns of overbought exhaustion.

indicator_insights.rsi: Strong momentum at 68.1, trend continuation favored.
indicator_insights.mfi: Balanced volume flow at 48.5, institutional activity moderate.
indicator_insights.stochastic: Extreme overbought at 80.5, bearish divergence possible.
indicator_insights.macd: Early bullish crossover below zero. Recovery phase initiated, watch for confirmation.
indicator_insights.bollinger_bands: Price holding above midline. Bullish bias maintained, support at 156.61605.
indicator_insights.moving_average: Price 0.06% above MA. Uptrend confirmed, MA acting as dynamic support.
indicator_insights.parabolic_sar: SAR positioned below price at 156.49800. Uptrend active, trailing stop recommended.
indicator_insights.ichimoku: Price above cloud components. Strong bullish structure, all systems aligned for longs.
